Header: Alliance agrees to the 20th amendment: MP Dilan Perera challengers to pass the amendment
Content: The SLFP states that it is not against the 20th amendment to the constitution. Former Minister Dilan Perera made this comment in response to a statement made by deputy foreign affairs Minister Ajith P Perera during a media Briefing. Deputy Minister Ajith P Perera questioned the stance of the SLFP regarding the 20th amendment.
